set recolor "true"
set recolor-keephue "true"

set completion-bg "#242729"
set completion-fg "#dedede"
set completion-group-bg "#242729"
set completion-group-fg "#8a9887"
set completion-highlight-bg "#8a9887"
set completion-highlight-fg "#242729"

set recolor-lightcolor "#242729"
set recolor-darkcolor "#dedede"

set default-bg "#242729"
set inputbar-bg "#242729"
set inputbar-fg "#dedede"

set notification-bg "#242729"
set notification-fg "#dedede"
set notification-error-bg "#9c6b7a"
set notification-error-fg "#dedede"
set notification-warning-bg "#9c6b7a"
set notification-warning-fg "#dedede"

set statusbar-bg "#242729"
set statusbar-fg "#dedede"

set render-loading-bg "#242729"
set render-loading-fg "#dedede"

set highlight-color "#8a9887"
set highlight-active-color "#8a9887"

set window-title-home-tilde true
set statusbar-basename true
set selection-clipboard clipboard
